welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Breckerfeld, Germany! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Breckerfeld has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, used primarily for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for up to 2 hours per device.
